biography: Riku, brother of Panu, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While Riku is considered retired from Hector Trophée events, his presence is still felt among those who have competed alongside him.

Though Riku has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on one occasion, his impact extends beyond mere participation. His strategic mind and meticulous planning have earned him the respect of peers and spectators alike.

While Riku may not be actively contending for the Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy in the upcoming tournament, his legacy serves as an inspiration to those who seek to master the nuances of golf. Only time will tell if we see Riku's return to the course.
